0100101111101011 1000111110110111 1 -> sum: 1101101110100011, cout: 0
0100101110111110 0100110100011010 0 -> sum: 1001100011011000, cout: 0
1111111011111100 1100111001101001 0 -> sum: 1100110101100101, cout: 1
1000011011100110 1111010100001010 1 -> sum: 0111101111110001, cout: 1

0011101000111110 1111011101000000 1 -> sum: 0011000101111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
